name: Puku Pods
address: Jl. Air Terjun Yeh Hoo, Br. Gunungsari Umakayu, Jatiluwih, Kec. Penebel, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82152, Indonesia
review 1:
Stayed one night in the cabin and one night in the tent. Loved ‚Äòem both. Of course, cabin has more to offer: compact toilet & bathroom inside, pantry, sofa bed, more lights and better view. But tent also offers different experience.

Expect chirping birds and sound of nature 24/7, the ability of breathe easily and effortless calming mind.

Staffs are helpful and communicative. Totally recommended.
review 2: I am not a fan of glamping. But I changed my m8nd when I went to Puku Pods. I love the cabin as it has an ensuite bathroom. The location is very close to  the Jatilewih rice terraces. It is walking distance to Yeh Hoo Falls.   When you stay at Puku Pods, you are treated like family. Stress-free, relaxing and very beautiful with rice fields all around you. Puku Pods is a place you want to go to if you want to escape the touristy places of Bali.
review 3:
We had really good time at Puku Pods,
The location and surroundings was great. Rooms and public space are clean, there was only 4 tents and 2 cabin which is good so not crowded. Food and BBQ are simply yummy! Our kids loved it.
We looking forward for our next trip there!
review 4: Absolutely loved my two night stay at Pukupods, firstly the area is so serene and relaxing. The team at Pukupods were so welcoming and accommodating. The cabins and tents were all spacious, clean and comfy! I can‚Äôt wait to come back and spend a weekend here! & they‚Äôre pet friendly, big win ‚ú® thank you Pukupods!!!
review 5: Very nice glamping experience. Tent was comfortable, sharing toilet also clean and nice. Definitely will go back!

name: Damara villa jatiluwih
address: Kawan, Jalan, Jatiluwih, Penebel, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82152, Indonesia
review 1:
I am an independent traveller who likes to travel with my own personal hygine stuff. I like to stay in a quiet place and a room with small kitchen and bathroom. Damara villa is one of the place matches with my style. The owner provides an assistant to help guest in daylight. She is a balinese old lady and she is good in cooking balinese food especially vegetarian. The vegetables are fresh from the farm (forest). Fern is one of the menu...so healthy. If you wish to stay here, you can practice your bahasa indonesia skill communicating with the lady such as changing bed sheet, clean up the room on particular day even what you want to have for your breakfast. Once you stay here, you will feel like home with a new family.

The villa also provides a "Bale" to do meditation. If you are a spiritual traveller, you will like to stay in this place for your retreat.

Internet connection is slightly difficult but if you use XL, you still are able to get the signal.  So if you plan to stay here, you must ask yourself, are you ready for technology detox?
review 2:
Natural view villa with rais terrace full view and batukaru mountain as a green background, now open with 2 rooms at start.. great panorama location in the subak heritage at Jatiluwih Penebel Tabanan.. as one of world heritage has writen at Unesco..
Villa stnding in crystal guavana garden.. guest can get free..
review 3: Quiet, private, no frills retreat place to stay near the nature. Bring your own toothbrush and shampoo. Very hospitable hosts!
review 4: The place quite nice event quite far..almost can say located in nowhere...sadly that the wi-fi and AC not working and said the AC broken. There is a small pool for swimming here. Breakfast available that you can choose one. Fried rice, fried noodle or bread with jam. They serve fresh guava juice because they have guava trees next the wall...it said the normal price is Rp. 1,700,00/night
review 5: Comfortable and quiet villa with beautiful views of rice fields and mountains

review 1: Terrible, dirty, leeches and ticks all over us after coming back up the path from the bottom, and the waterfall itself is not amazing
review 2: Entry fee is close to daytime robbery

name: Santya Loka Lodge & Twin Waterfall
address: Jatiluwih, Penebel, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82152, Indonesia
review 1:
Very pleasant stay!!!
Kind & Friendly Host take care of our necessary needs. We were welcomed with wedang jahe, and given direction to track choice around the lodge.
Beautiful and soothing scenery right in front of our room. The property has track to the twin waterfall that we enjoyed during our stay. Very freshening after hectic season in the town.
Even my little girl enjoy doing her routine at the gazebo to embrace the sun light :)
Really wish we can stay longer :(

Thank you Ms. Fetty & Mr. Wayan!!!
review 2: Such a great host! Best location with lovely room view. We recommend this hotel. I wish the hotel will put some Exhaust Fan or Small Air Conditioning to make the stay more enjoyable.
review 3: It's a wow for Santya Loka..you can find yourself enjoy beautiful nature rice field, twin waterfall, more over friendly couple the owner of Santya Loka‚ù§Ô∏èüî•
review 5:
A very warm welcome that i experience during my stay in Santya Loka from the owners. it's more than just a place to stay.  I treasure some interesting activities and experiences day by day. The lodge has a path to magical twin waterfalls, combined with breathtaking view of rice fields in front of the lodge. You also can do some hiking activity to the hilly place with fresh air in the morning and have breakfast with rice field and mountains view..furthermore at night we can witness beautiful moonlight in front of our room. It's a perfect place to stay if you need some quiet moment. The place is also near some attractive places like Pura Ulun Danu-Bedugul, the blooms garden,  luna beach club, Tanah Lot, and Ubud.

Hope we can visit this beautiful place again with our beloved friends and family.
